actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT  Docket, 
					IFNULL(p + rejects,p) as Pieces, 
					IFNULL(rejectjas,0) as Rejected, 
					Received, 
					IFNULL(rejectjas + Received, Received) as Total_JAS,
					MONTHNAME(Date) as Month,
					WEEK(Date) as Week,
					Product
				FROM
					(SELECT Docket, 
					 CONCAT(ANY_VALUE(Grade),'-',ANY_VALUE(Length)) as Product, 
					 COUNT(Docket) as p, 
					 SUM(JAS) as Received, 
					 ANY_VALUE(Date) as Date,
					 ANY_VALUE(Location) as Row
					 FROM Scaling GROUP BY Docket) v
				LEFT JOIN
					(SELECT Docket as D, 
					 COUNT(Docket) as rejects, 
					 SUM(JAS) as rejectjas  
					 FROM Reject_Scaling GROUP BY Docket) r
				ON r.D = v.Docket
